name: 弟子
text:
和泉さん
解毒剤は──
trans:
Izumi-san.
The antidote──

name: 愛依
text:
うちが持ってないの……
わかってるっしょ……？
trans:
I don't have it...
You know that, don't you...?

name: 弟子
text: …………そうですね
trans: ...You're right.

name: 千雪
text:
……お疲れ様です
っていうのも、変な感じかな……？
trans:
...Good work. 
Is what I'd like to say but... 
It's a little strange, isn't it...?

name: 弟子
text:
真犯人登場、の台詞としては……
気が利いているかと
trans:
"Here comes the real murderer"
...I thought a line like that might be appropriate now.

name: 弟子
text:
でも、いいんですか？
ロビーを離れて……
trans:
Is it fine for you to be in a place like this?
Away from the lobby...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、遅いから様子を見にいく、って言って……
ちょっと強引に来ちゃいました
trans:
Fufu. "They sure are taking their time," I said...
Perhaps I was a little forceful with that.

name: 愛依
text:
……
で、どうするの……解毒剤……
trans:
...
So, what do we do... about the antidotes...

name: 千雪
text: そうね……
trans: Let's see...

name: 千雪
text:
あの子たちに渡したら
きっと、真実に気がついちゃうから……
trans:
It'll blow our cover if we give
it to them, so...

name: 千雪
text: 砂糖水を飲んでもらおうかなって
trans: We'll just give them some sugared water or something.

name: 愛依
trans: ...To everyone...?

name: 愛依
text:
……あんたなら……
……そうするよね……
trans:
...I knew you'd...
...Do something like that...

name: 千雪
text:
こちらが解毒剤のアンプルです
お弟子さんもどうぞ
trans:
Here, take this, Mr. Disciple.
It's an ampule with the antidote.

name: 千雪
text: 残りは私が廃棄します
trans: I'll dispose of the rest.

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、そんな顔をしないでほしいな？
trans: Fufu, don't make a face like that.

name: 千雪
text:
秘密を守り通した愛依ちゃんは
これからもずっと、家族と穏やかに暮らしていける
trans:
For Mei-chan, who so earnestly kept her secrets, 
you'll be able to live peacefully with your family 
from now on.

name: 千雪
text: それだけじゃなくて……
trans: And not just peacefully...

name: 千雪
text:
『Ａ』のお金とファイルの情報を使って
もっと楽しく、もっと豊かな日々を送れるんだもの
trans:
With A's wealth and secret files, 
you'll be able to live a rich and fun-filled life.

name: 千雪
text: 未来は薔薇色……
trans: Truly, a rose-coloured future...

name: 千雪
text: そうでしょう？
trans: Am I wrong?

name: 愛依
text:
…………みんなを殺して……
……だけどね……
trans:
...After killing everyone...
...That is...

name: 千雪
text:
あなたたちはアンプルを受け取った
もう、逃れようもなく……私の共犯者
trans:
There's no turning back now. 
The moment the ampules landed in your hands, 
you're accomplices to my sin.

name: 千雪
text:
罪の意識とか、良心とか……
余計なものは捨てておくことね
trans:
Unnecessary emotions like guilt and righteousness...
Discard them.

name: 弟子
text: ああ
trans: Yeah.

name: 千雪
text:
…………ふふっ
今後とも末永く、よろしくね
trans:
...Fufu.
I look forward to working with the both of you, okay?
